verses.roman:
aneka karila, tabu nā haya cetana
ācārya kāndena, kānde saba bhakta-gaṇa

synonyms: aneka karila—much endeavor was done; tabu—still; nā haya—there was not; cetana—consciousness; ācārya kāndena—Advaita Ācārya began to cry; kānde—cried; saba bhakta-gaṇa—all the other devotees.
translation: When the boy did not regain consciousness after some time, Advaita Ācārya and the other devotees began to cry.
